title: Top Gear Bolivia Special
resume: It features the presenters James May, Jeremy Clarkson, and Richard Hammond travelling 1,000 miles through South America from the rainforests of Bolivia to the Pacific coast of Chile. The presenters used second hand off-road vehicles, bought locally in Bolivia for less than £3,500 each
